changeSet.createView: SELECT a.id AS id, CONCAT(uafirst.data, ' ', ualast.data) AS userName, a.short_description as shortDescription, from_unixtime(floor(a.created_on / 1000)) as createdOn, CASE WHEN union_select.id is not null THEN CONCAT_WS(' ', mlvh.VALUE1, mlvh.VALUE2) ELSE SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.opt2, '[#]', 2), '[#]', - 1) END AS objectName, CASE WHEN union_select.id is not null THEN union_select.projectName ELSE SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.opt2, '[#]', 1) END AS projectName, CASE WHEN union_select.id is not null THEN CONCAT_WS(' ', mlvh1.VALUE1, mlvh1.VALUE2) ELSE SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.opt2, '[#]', 3), '[#]', -1) END AS workType, a.opt1 as reason, CASE WHEN union_select.id is not null THEN union_select.tenant_id ELSE SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.opt2, '[#]', - 2), '[#]', 1) END AS tenant_id, a.reference_id as reference_id, a.opt2 as additionalInfo, SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.opt2, '[#]', - 1) as resource_key FROM al_audit a INNER JOIN aaa_user u ON u.id = a.prin_session_id INNER JOIN aaa_user_attributes uafirst ON uafirst.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN aaa_user_attributes ualast ON ualast.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN UNION_VIEW as union_select ON union_select.id = a.reference_id LEFT JOIN SUB_MASTER_LIST_VALUE mlv ON mlv.id = union_select.object LEFT JOIN SUB_MASTER_LIST_VALUE_HISTORY mlvh ON mlvh.FK_MASTER_LIST_VALUE = mlv.id and mlvh.TO_DATE is null LEFT JOIN SUB_MASTER_LIST_VALUE mlv1 ON mlv1.id = union_select.workType LEFT JOIN SUB_MASTER_LIST_VALUE_HISTORY mlvh1 ON mlvh1.FK_MASTER_LIST_VALUE = mlv1.id and mlvh1.TO_DATE is null WHERE opt3 = '1' and level_id IN (SELECT id FROM al_audit_level WHERE NAME = 'PROJECT_LEVEL') and ualast.name = 'LASTNAME' and uafirst.name = 'FIRSTNAME';
